ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 99
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Horthar.  I am a paladin as well doing the smithing skill just a bit against my will.  Well not exactly.  I made my dwarf to be a smith, but when I started
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Horthar. I am a paladin as well doing the smithing skill just a bit
against my will. Well not exactly. I made my dwarf to be a smith, but when
I started I just figured dwarves would be inherently more skilled at the
smithy than other characters. Well I was wrong. Most important skill it
seems is INT, then WIS. Also CHA. Dwarves pretty much blow at all these
hehe. Well this is the best website I could find on blacksmithing. Very
organized and very well put together.

http://members.gotnet.net/kolijahc/blacksmith.html

Enjoy,
Flintforge Steelstorm
30th Paladin of Brell
Karana


> Date: Sun, 07 Nov 1999 02:12:34 -0600

>hello
>I am a smith but not very good do to lack of practice and also a paladin
>
>I am on the xenology server and need some paladin armor if anyone could
>help me please let me know
>
>Thank you,
>Horthar
